top.title: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
top.summary: The killing of Alex Pretti over the weekend led Minnesota officials and locals to renew calls for Trump to end his immigration operation there.

top.title: 'I don't let bullies win,' says US congresswoman Omar after substance thrown at her
top.summary: The Minnesota Democrat was uninjured and continued to speak at her event, after being sprayed with an unidentified liquid.

top.title: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
top.summary: The technology giant confirmed the redundancies hours after it told staff in an email sent in error.

top.title: Government offers UK adults free AI training for work
top.summary: The online lessons give advice on things such as how to prompt chatbots or complete admin tasks.

top.title: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
top.summary: The technology giant confirmed the redundancies hours after it told staff in an email sent in error.

top.title: Pornhub to restrict access for UK users from next week
top.summary: The changes mean only those who have a Pornhub account and have verified their age will be able to access it in the UK soon.
